title: How to Make a White Lady Cocktail

steps.headline: Fill the shaker halfway with ice cubes.
Pour in the lemon juice.
steps.description: Then pour in the Cointreau and gin.

steps.headline: Strain the cocktail into the chilled cocktail glass.

text: Chill the cocktail glass beforehand.  Fill the shaker halfway with ice cubes.  Pour in the lemon juice. Then pour in the Cointreau and gin. Shake well.  Strain the cocktail into the chilled cocktail glass.  Put a straw and Serve.  Finished.
